text: James Burrows (born 7 July 1991) is an English actor. He is best known for his portrayal of Ali Neeson in the ITV soap opera Coronation Street from 2018 to 2020, and his recurring roles in Safe House (2015) and Mount Pleasant (2016). == Other websites == * Category:1991 births Category:English television actors Category:English movie actors Category:People from Derby Category:Actors from Derbyshire Category:Living people
title: James Burrows
